verses.verse: <S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G1969>rebuke<s%> an <S%G4245>older<s%> <S%G235>man,<s%> but <S%G3870>exhort<s%> him <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3962>father;<s%> the younger <S%G3501>men<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G80>brothers;<s%>
the elder <S%G4245>women<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3384>mothers;<s%> the <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G79>sisters,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G47>purity.<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> who <S%G3689>are<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1549>grandchildren,<s%> let them <S%G3129>learn<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to show <S%G2151>piety<s%> towards their own <S%G3624>family,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G591>to<s%> <S%G287>repay<s%> their <S%G4269>parents,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G587>acceptable<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> she <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3689>is<s%> a <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G3689>indeed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3443>desolate,<s%> has her <S%G1679>hope<s%> set <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> continues <S%G4357>in<s%> <S%G1162>petitions<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4335>prayers<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>
<S%G1161>But<s%> she <S%G3588>who<s%> gives herself to <S%G4684>pleasure<s%> is <S%G2348>dead<s%> while she <S%G2198>lives.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> Also <S%G3853>command<s%> these <S%G5023>things,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may <S%G5600>be<s%> without <S%G423>reproach.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>anyone<s%> <S%G3756>doesn't<s%> <S%G4306>provide<s%> <S%G4306>for<s%> his <S%G2398>own,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> his own <S%G3609>household,<s%> he has <S%G720>denied<s%> the <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> than an <S%G571>unbeliever.<s%>

<S%G2639>Let<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> one be <S%G2639>enrolled<s%> as a <S%G5503>widow<s%> <S%G1640>under<s%> <S%G1835>sixty<s%> years <S%G2094>old,<s%> having <S%G1096>been<s%> the <S%G1135>wife<s%> of <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%>

being <S%G3140>approved<s%> <S%G3140>by<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has brought up <S%G5044>children,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has been hospitable to <S%G3580>strangers,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G3538>washed<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%>' <S%G4228>feet,<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> she has <S%G1884>relieved<s%> the <S%G2346>afflicted,<s%> and <S%G1487>if<s%> she has diligently <S%G1872>followed<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3868>refuse<s%> <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5503>widows,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they have grown wanton <S%G2691>against<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> they <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G1060>marry;<s%>
<S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G114>rejected<s%> <S%G3588>their<s%> <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G4102>pledge.<s%>

<S%G1161>Besides,<s%> they <S%G260>also<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> to be <S%G692>idle,<s%> going <S%G4022>about<s%> from house to <S%G3614>house.<s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>Not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G692>idle,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5397>gossips<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4021>busybodies,<s%> <S%G2980>saying<s%> things <S%G3588>which<s%> they <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3361>not.<s%>

I <S%G1014>desire<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1060>that<s%> the younger <S%G3501>widows<s%> <S%G1060>marry,<s%> bear <S%G5041>children,<s%> rule the <S%G3616>household,<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3367>no<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> to the <S%G480>adversary<s%> for <S%G3059>insulting.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2235>already<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G1624>have<s%> turned <S%G1624>aside<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G4567>Satan.<s%>

<S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G4103>man<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4103>woman<s%> who <S%G4103>believes<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G5503>widows,<s%> let them <S%G1884>relieve<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G916>let<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly<s%> be <S%G916>burdened;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might <S%G1884>relieve<s%> those <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G3689>are<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G3689>indeed.<s%>

<S%G515>Let<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> who <S%G4291>rule<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> be counted <S%G515>worthy<s%> of <S%G1362>double<s%> <S%G5092>honor,<s%> <S%G3122>especially<s%> those who <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in <S%G1319>teaching.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1124>Scripture<s%> <S%G3004>says,<s%> "You <S%G5392>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5392>muzzle<s%> the <S%G1016>ox<s%> when it treads out the <S%G248>grain.<s%>" <S%G2532>And,<s%> "The <S%G2040>laborer<s%> is <S%G514>worthy<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3408>wages.<s%>"

<S%G3361>Don't<s%> <S%G3858>receive<s%> an <S%G2724>accusation<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> an <S%G4245>elder,<s%> <S%G1622>except<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the word of <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3144>witnesses.<s%>
Those who <S%G264>sin,<s%> <S%G1651>reprove<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3062>rest<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2192>may<s%> be in <S%G5401>fear.<s%>

I <S%G1263>command<s%> you in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2962><s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1588>chosen<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> you <S%G5442>observe<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> <S%G4299>prejudice,<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G2596>by<s%> <S%G4346>partiality.<s%>

<S%G2007>Lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G5030>hastily<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> no <S%G3367>one,<s%> <S%G3366>neither<s%> be a participant <S%G2841>in<s%> other <S%G245>men<s%>'s <S%G266>sins.<s%> <S%G5083>Keep<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G53>pure.<s%>

Be no <S%G3371>longer<s%> a <S%G5202>drinker<s%> of <S%G5202>water<s%> <S%G235>only,<s%> but <S%G5530>use<s%> a <S%G3641>little<s%> <S%G3631>wine<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4751>stomach<s%>'s <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4437>frequent<s%> <S%G769>infirmities.<s%>

<S%G5100>Some<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>'s <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4271>evident,<s%> <S%G4254>preceding<s%> them <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> also follow <S%G1872>later.<s%>

In the <S%G5615>same<s%> way <S%G2532>also<s%> there <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%> that <S%G2192>are<s%> <S%G4271>obvious,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> those that <S%G2192>are<s%> <S%G247>otherwise<s%> <S%G1410>can't<s%> be <S%G2928>hidden.<s%>
